title: Dev executor
description: Serves a GraphQL server with GraphQL interface by building artifacts on the fly

dir.description: The path of the directory containing the GraphQL Mesh config.

range.description: The range of ports to select from. (Takes priority over `number`)

from.description: The first port of the range. Must be in the range `1024`...`65535`.

to.description: The last port of the range. Must be in the range `1024`...`65535` and must be greater than `from`.

number.description: The port number to run on.

fallback.description: Fallback action to take if the define port is unavailable.

require.description: Loads specific require.extensions before running the codegen and reading the configuration.
